price: Hwan na ͻyε nnipa bͻneni kyεn obi a yεde ne Wura Nyankopͻn nsεm no tu no fo a ͻtwe ne ho fri ho? Nokorε sε Yεbɛtua abͻneεfoͻ no so ka.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ ثُمَّ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهَآۚ إِنَّا مِنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman aẓlamu mimman dhukkira biāyāti rabbihi thumma aʿraḍa ʿanhā innā mina al-muj'rimīna muntaqimūna
